name: Flix and Chill 2: Millennials
description: A dating sim where you jump into the shoes of the modern Millennial to find yourself and love in a time when true romance seems fleeting.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8 / 7 Processor: 2.0 GHz CPU (Dual Core recommended) Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 512MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8 / 7 Processor: 2.0 GHz CPU (Dual Core recommended) Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 512MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
